title: NEW SHOW NAME: The Second Studio
itunes:title: NEW SHOW NAME: The Second Studio
description:
Rebrand Announcement! 'The Midnight Charette' is changing to 'The Second Studio' at the end of this week. We will have new graphics, a new website www.secondstudiopod.com (also launching at the end of this week), and new social media handles @secondstudiopod 

If you are currently subscribed, the change should not affect your subscription. Our RSS feed will remain the same. Our old website and email address will be running for a short period, so if we get disconnected during the transition you can still contact us that way.

More news to come.

Thanks for listening!
David
content:encoded:
Rebrand Announcement! 'The Midnight Charette' is changing to 'The Second Studio' at the end of this week. We will have new graphics, a new website www.secondstudiopod.com (also launching at the end of this week), and new social media handles @secondstudiopod 

If you are currently subscribed, the change should not affect your subscription. Our RSS feed will remain the same. Our old website and email address will be running for a short period, so if we get disconnected during the transition you can still contact us that way.

More news to come.

Thanks for listening! David
itunes:subtitle: The Midnight Charette is changing to The Second Studio
itunes:author: David Lee and Marina Bourderonnet
